Summary

Biography

Personal: Born in Ostrava, The Czech Republic...parents are Petr and Bohdana Michnev... has one sister Marcel (22)...hobbies include soccer, volleyball and reading...favorite food is pizza...enjoys listening to music artist Michael Jackson...other favorite include the movie Pulp Fiction and athlete Andre Agassi...in 10 years he would like to still be playing tennis...chose HPU because of a friend...major is Finance.

Prior to HPU: A graduate of Maticni gymnazium in Ostrava, The Czech Republic...where he lettered in tennis.

HPU: 2013: Went 16-2 in singles, 18-5 in doubles and was ranked third nationally in singles and fifth in doubles…. named an Intercollegiate Tennis Association (ITA) All-American, the HPU Male Athlete of the Year, a Capital One Academic All-American, and the ITA's West Region Authur Ashe Leadership & Sportsmanship Award winner… Named PacWest Co-Player of the Year, First Team All-PacWest, and PacWest Tournament MVP… 2012: For the second year in a row, Michnev was named an ITA All-American, finishing eighth in the country...with a record of 13-4, mostly in first singles...with partner first doubles, Patric Guenther, they ranked #3 in the country according to ITA with an overall record of 16-3. 2011: Michnev was named an ITA All-American, finishing 2011 as the fourth ranked player in the nation....Playing exclusively at first singles, Michnev went 15-3....In March 2011, he knocked off the country's top ranked player....went 12-6 in doubles.
